attributes.action: Reward people for summiting dashcam footage of careless and dangerous driving.
attributes.background: Very simply, this would encourage more care and consideration when driving. Everyday dangerous driving is witnessed and this could be a solution to help bring down the numbers of accidents and deaths on our roads. Reward money could come from a percentage of the fines paid.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
